author: Simon Difford
description: With its sunny colour and tropical fruity flavour and rum base, the Yellow Bird certainly evokes the Caribbean. Two rums and three fruit juices, but the ripe banana and peppermint freshness of the two liqueurs that most influence this lightly Tiki cocktail.
name: Yellow Bird
recipeIngredient: 20 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
20 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
